item.name: Potion of Last Stand
entries: This shimmering, red-gold potion is contained in a thick glass vial. When consumed, the Potion of Last Stand grants the drinker a surge of survival instinct and power in dire conditions.

entries.name: Effects
entries: When a creature drinks this potion, they gain the following benefits for 10 minutes:
- If the creature is reduced to 0 hit points, they automatically stabilize and remain at 1 hit point instead.
- The creature gains advantage on all attack rolls, saving throws, and ability checks.
- The creature's speed is increased by 10 feet.
Once the potion's effects end, the creature suffers one level of exhaustion. This potion's effects only trigger if the creature is below 50% of their maximum hit points at the time of consumption.
